subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Not a happy EVPer!
author: erick hunter
full_text:
--0-1976347771-1185566232=:33180
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Mr Sumption, I desire very much to obtain a "box". What would it take to get one??? I am a serious researcher with over 40 yrs. of investigation under my belt. After reading and reviewing everything I could find concerning your device, I, personally, have the greatest confidence in making milestone leaps of progress with it. I would be very pleased to hear back from you soonest. Thank you in advance.    --Roderick Pyatt, Ph.D (Paranormal Psychology)
   
   
  

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          That was a mistake to make my complaints about users on the group, for that 
I apologize. I wouldn't ask for boxes back, firstly all the boxes out there 
are proto types to test various configurations, and if I kept them, they 
would just sit on a shelf until I felt like doing upgrades, like on 12 and 
13. Second, I try not to give with strings.

Frank-S

__________________________________________________________
http://newlivehotmail.com
